thread.title: Quinoa, Chocolate, and Orange Cake [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
thread.title_full: Quinoa, Chocolate, and Orange Cake [Vegan, Gluten-Free]

author: Camille David
title: Quinoa, Chocolate, and Orange Cake [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
text:
February 27, 2017 LIKE OGP ON FACEBOOK : This cake is dense, rich and absolutely delicious. It is packed with chocolate, quinoa, and orange zest which combine to make an irresistible pallet of flavors. Works perfectly as a dessert or as a treat with coffee. Quinoa, Chocolate, and Orange Cake [Vegan, Gluten-Free] This Recipe is : 1 cup, plus 2 3/4 tablespoons quinoa, cooked 2 tablespoons pure cocoa powder 4 tablespoons rice flour 1/2 teaspoon of baking soda 1 orange Preheat the oven to 350°F. Mix the chia seeds with the water and let it stand. In a bowl, mix quinoa with cocoa powder, flour, sugar, and baking soda. Wash the orange and collect the zest. Add it to the mixture. Melt half the chocolate and add it to the cake. Cut the rest finely and add to the dough. Add the applesauce and chia seeds. Grease a rectangular pan and pour the dough into it. Bake it for about 25 minutes. Allow it to cool completely before removing it from the mold. Place orange rings on the cake. EXPLORE MORE VEGAN RECIPES WITH THESE INGREDIENTS 
AUTHOR & RECIPE DETAILS 
Simple, healthy vegan recipes from international cuisines. Hi! I'm Camille, a young vegan from France. In my blog, I love to share recipes but also posts about topics I am most interested in such as: minimalism, zero waste, DIY, traveling...etc. I am also a tea-lover and a bookworm, and I love taking photos, traveling, doing yoga and weight-lifting. Please come and visit me on Rosenoisettes!
